introduction.section1: Indonesia is the largest archipelago in the world. Going from 13,000 to 16,000 islands in 5 years, nobody knows exactly how many islands it is composed of. There are still unexplored and unnamed islands. On the other side, several islands are famous and touristy.
introduction.section2: Trek on the volcanoes of Java, rice fields and temples in Bali, hike in the tropical forests of Sumatra, rest on the beaches of Lombok or find out the dragons of Komodo Island.
introduction.section3: Discover through our articles and our photos our island-by-island trip to Indonesia.

google-description: Indonesia is the largest archipelago in the world. Trek on the volcanoes of Java, rice fields and temples in Bali, hike in the tropical forests of Sumatra, rest on the beaches of Lombok or find out the dragons of Komodo Island. Follow our island-by-island guide to discover our selection of must-see places. Our travelogue with photos, tips, and advice.
social-network-description: Indonesia is the largest archipelago in the world. Trek on the volcanoes of Java, rice fields and temples in Bali, hike in the tropical forests of Sumatra, rest on the beaches of Lombok or find out the dragons of Komodo Island.

tour.title: Travel around
tour.subtitle: The country from island to island
